body:
76215_PvEmeraldSword85TempbanAbusing /ReportMay 26, 2014 at 02:24 AMMay 27, 2014 at 02:24 AM

Could this be explained? I've never used report? Is this a mistake and you've banned the wrong person? I'm pretty annoyed right now as I was playing with friends, please explain this too me.

title: I have been Temp - Banned For abusing report?

replies.body: Looking at the database it does look like you haven't reported anyone... I've appealed the tempban and will be talking to the staff.
replies.body_tagged: Looking at the database it does look like you haven't reported anyone... I've appealed the tempban and will be talking to the staff.
